mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RBOARD (RNUM,MID,RTITLE,RCONTENT, RFILENAME, RRDATE,RSTATUS, RIP) VALUES(RSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rtitle},#{rcontent}, #{rfilename}, SYSDATE, #{rstatus} ,#{rip, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM(SELECT R.*, MNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RPBOARD B WHERE B.RNUM= R.RNUM)AS RCNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M WHERE M.MID = R.MID AND R.MID=#{mid} AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' ORDER BY RRDATE DESC)A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*)CNT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM(SELECT R.*, MNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RPBOARD B WHERE B.RNUM= R.RNUM)AS RCNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M WHERE M.MID = R.MID and r.mid=#{mid} AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' ORDER BY RRDATE DESC)A)

select.if: SELECT A.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, r.*, MNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RPBOARD B WHERE B.RNUM= R.RNUM)AS RCNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M, FRIEND F WHERE(M.MID = R.MID AND F.MID = R.MID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS=0) OR (M.MID=F.FID AND R.MID=F.FID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS = 1 AND F.MID=#{mid}) OR (M.MID=R.MID AND F.MID=R.MID AND R.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS =2 )ORDER BY RRDATE DESC)A WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT A.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN, r.*, MNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*)FROM RPBOARD B WHERE B.RNUM= R.RNUM)AS RCNT FROM RBOARD R, MEMBER M, FRIEND F WHERE(M.MID = R.MID AND F.MID = M.MID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS=0 AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR (M.MID=F.FID AND R.MID=F.FID AND MSTATUS =1 AND RSTATUS = 1 AND F.MID=#{mid} AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR (M.MID=R.MID AND F.MID=R.MID AND R.MID=#{mid} AND RSTATUS =2 AND RTITLE LIKE '%'||#{rtitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') ORDER BY RRDATE DESC)A WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

mapper.update: UPDATE RBOARD SET RHIT = RHIT+1 WHERE RNUM=#{rnum}
